<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/smartmutex">SmartMutex</a> - An R/W mutex with a compile time constant parameter that indicates whether this mutex should become a no-op when we&#39;re not running in multithreaded mode. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/smartrwmutex/#details">More...</a>

<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Single-threaded debugging code.  This would be racy in multithreaded</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// mode, but provides not basic checks in single threaded mode.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(writers == 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Writer lock already acquired!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">    ++writers;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!mt&#95;only || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a09a29eef9752b39c34aa646a5812b0a7">llvm&#95;is&#95;multithreaded</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">      impl.unlock();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
